paper.title: A Disk around the Planetary-mass Companion GSC 06214-00210 b: Clues about the Formation of Gas Giants on Wide Orbits
paper.authors: Bowler, Brendan P.; Liu, Michael C.; Kraus, Adam L.; Mann, Andrew W.; Ireland, Michael J.
paper.journal: The Astrophysical Journal, Volume 743, Issue 2, article id. 148 (2011).
